body: My name is Austin Reifsteck. I am working to support the MVAPICH project at OSU. I have become one of the maintainers of our Spack deployments. I have created this PR to update the package.py file to support the MVAPICH2 GDR 2.3.5 release. I am new to Spack, so please let me know if you see anything amiss! Thank you.
title: OSU mvapich2 GDR 2.3.5 package.py update
